creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: bronze ritual bell with handle in the shape of a five-pronged vajra, handle stem and bell shoulder decorated with lotus petal design; probably intended for use in Esoteric Buddhist rites
markings: inside base of bell: (In the generation of the Priest Kōshō)
title: Ritual bell with handle in the shape of the vajra
